mapper.select: select name , m.subject_name , to_char(m.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_date" , to_char(m.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "end_date" from member m join subject on (subject = subject_no) where subject = #{subject} and sort = 2
select * from ( select board_no , board_title , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" from notice order by create_date desc ) where rownum <= 7

select e.test_no , id , subject_no , test_title , exam_time , score , ea.status from exam e join exam_answer ea on (e.test_no = ea.test_no) where e.status = 'N' and subject_no = #{subject} and student_id = #{id} order by e.test_no
select test_title , q1 , q2 , q3 , q4 , q5 , exam_time from exam e join exam_question q on e.test_no = q.test_no where e.test_no = #{testNo}
select count(*) from notice where status = 'Y'
select board_no , board_title , board_writer , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , count from notice where status = 'Y' order by board_no desc
select board_no , board_title , board_writer , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , board_content from notice where board_no = #{boardNo}
select count(*) from material_board where status = 'Y'
select board_no , board_title , board_writer , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , count from material_board where status = 'Y' order by board_no desc
select board_no , board_title , board_writer , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , count from material_board where status = 'Y' order by board_no desc

select t.task_no , t.task_title , t.id , to_char(t.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_date" , to_char(t.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "end_date" , subject_no , submit_content , submit_date , ts.status from task t join task_submit ts on (t.task_no = ts.task_no) where student_id = #{id} and t.status = 'N' order by t.task_no desc
select task_no , student_id , submit_content , submit_date , modify_date , status from task_submit where student_id = #{id}

select t.task_no as "task_no" , t.task_title as "task_title" , id , to_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_date" , to_char(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "end_date" , t.task_content as "task_content" , ts.status as "status" , ts.submit_content as "submit_content" , origin_name , change_name , end_date from task t left join task_file tf on (t.task_no = tf.task_no) left join task_submit ts on (t.task_no = ts.task_no) where t.task_no = #{taskNo} and student_id = #{studentId} order by t.task_no

SELECT ts.task_no as "task_no" , t.task_title as "task_title" , ts.student_id as "student_id" , to_char(ts.submit_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "submit_date" , ts.submit_content as "submit_content" , t.task_content as "task_content" FROM task t INNER JOIN task_submit ts ON t.task_no = ts.task_no WHERE ts.task_no = #{taskNo} and ts.student_id = #{studentId} and ts.status = 'N'
mapper.update: update task_submit set submit_content = NULL , submit_date = NULL where task_no = #{taskNo} and student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.select: select alarm_no , id , alarm_content , alarm_type , status , create_date from alarm where id = #{id} and status = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into alarm ( alarm_no , id , alarm_content , alarm_type , status , create_date ) values ( seq_ano.nextval , #{id} , #{alarmContent} , #{alarmType} , 'N' , sysdate )
mapper.select: select board_no , board_title , board_writer , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , count from qna where status = 'Y' order by board_no desc
select test_no , a1 , a2 , a3 , a4 , a5 , score from exam_answer where test_no = #{testNo} and student_id = #{studentId}
select test_no , a1 , a2 , a3 , a4 , a5 , score , test_title from exam_answer join exam using (test_no) where student_id = #{studentId}
select test_no , q1 , q2 , q3 , q4 , q5 , a1 , a2 , a3 , a4 , a5 from exam_question where test_no = #{testNo}
select id from exam where test_no = #{testNo}
select id from task where task_no = #{taskNo}
